name: noob camp
desc: If you start the game with this rig, gain $10.

name: tmuxer
desc: If you are overclocked, have two jobs running, and have two dev powers, you may reorder your deck and discard.

name: hex
desc: If you are overclocked, any quick action that infects may infect one additional time.

name: junk rat
desc: Once per turn, if you are overclocked, you may draw an additional card. If you do, you must discard a card.
